snippet: Google insiders said they were not aware of the data collection in the Street View project either because it was not part of their job or they did not review the project documentation.
abstract: Google releases documents related to a federal investigation of its Street View mapping project; documents include sworn declarations from what appear to be engineers saying they were not aware of unauthorized data collection gathered from wireless networks as specially equipped cars passed through neighborhoods.
lead_paragraph: Google insiders said they were not aware of the data collection in the Street View project either because it was not part of their job or they did not review the project documentation.

headline.seo: Google Street View Case Brought Employee Denials
